name: Gumball's Fright
description:
Gumball's Freight is a short gumball slenderman game.

 Story: Gumball has a nightmare and appears in his own school.  After looking around, he realizes that this is no normal facility. There is something in here. Something that creeps silently. Unfortunately, Gumball learns the hard way... 

SFX- fesliyan studios
